data.author: Steve Jobs
data.quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven’t found it yet, keep looking. Don’t settle. As with all matters of the heart, you’ll know when you find it.

data.author: Steve Jobs
data.quote: If You Don’t Love It, You’re Going To Fail.

data.author: Bill Clinton
data.quote: If you live long enough, you'll make mistakes. But if you learn from them, you'll be a better person. It's how you handle adversity, not how it affects you. The main thing is never quit, never quit, never quit.

data.author: Bill Clinton
data.quote: We must teach our children to resolve their conflicts with words, not weapons.

data.author: Elon Musk
data.quote: The first step is to establish that something is possible; then probability will occur.

data.author: Elon Musk
data.quote: I say something, and then it usually happens. Maybe not on schedule, but it usually happens.

data.author: Nikola Tesla
data.quote: Our virtues and our failings are inseparable, like force and matter. When they separate, man is no more..

data.author: Nikola Tesla
data.quote: Great moments are born great opportunity.

data.author: Bill Gates
data.quote: Success is a lousy teacher. It seduces smart people into thinking they can’t lose.

data.author: Bill Gates
data.quote: As we look ahead into the next century, leaders will be those who empower others.
